description: Developing a data visualization tool for cybersecurity threat hunting in Joint Security and Operations Centre (JSOC). Enables 80+ internal Red/Blue Teamers to access real-time data on their security readiness and uncover vulnerabilities in their defenses.
technologies: Vue, Typescript, Django, Python, MySQL, Docker, Kubernetes, Redis, Openshift

description: Shipped out new widgets and features for over 2000 clients in the the Home Digital app as a part of the the Digital Banking Team. Automated the migration of client banking data to AzureSQL by architecting ETL pipelines and scripts, reducing manual efforts and processing times.
technologies: Angular, Typescript, ASP.NET, C#, Azure/Azure DevOps

description: Building a new suite of recruitment tools to streamline the UW Blueprint recruitment process in the Internal Tools Team. Implemented a robust analytics dashboard, providing the recruitment team with performance indicators and trend analysis, resulting in better decision-making.
technologies: React, Typescript, Express.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, GraphQL, Docker
